title.rendered: Waking Lion Press Announces the Release of Shakespeare’s First Folio Ultimate

content.rendered:
Front cover

Back cover

Title page, newly typeset

The most accurate transcription of the First Folio ever published, formatted as a typographic emulation of the original edition as published in 1623

WEST JORDAN, UT, US, April 13, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Waking Lion Press launches a new book, Shakespeare’s First Folio Ultimate, celebrating the 400th anniversary of the First Folio’s original publication in 1623. Edited by the scholarly team at PlayShakespeare.com, this is the most accurate transcription of the First Folio ever published.

ISBN 978-1-4341-0492-2
8.5 by 11 inches, 2.313 inches thick, 6.358 lb (2883.94 g)
1,138 pages
Case-laminate hardback
U.S. $54.95
Available at Amazon, Barnes & Noble, and other booksellers

In addition to its accuracy, this beautifully typeset volume emulates the look and layout of the original, the first time this has ever been done in a modern publication. It features:

* The First Folio’s original spellings: “If Musicke be the food of Loue, play on.”
* Historical ligatures, such as Æ.
* Special typographical characters, such as ſ, the “long s.”
* The page decorations used in the original.
* The beautiful Fell Types commissioned during Shakespeare’s era.

Jack Lyon, president of Waking Lion Press, notes, “First Folio facsimiles are available in print and online, but their uneven printing and primitive typesetting make them difficult to read. This edition resets the original text in new type, giving modern readers unprecedented access to Shakespeare’s plays as they were originally published.”

Download sample pages at www.wakinglionpress.com/First_Folio_Ultimate.pdf.

Jack Lyon
Waking Lion Press
email us here

You just read:

News Provided By

April 14, 2023, 00:52 GMT


EIN Presswire’s priority is source transparency. We do not allow opaque clients, and our editors try to be careful about weeding out false and misleading content.
As a user, if you see something we have missed, please do bring it to our attention. Your help is welcome. EIN Presswire, Everyone’s Internet News Presswire,
tries to define some of the boundaries that are reasonable in today’s world. Please see our
Editorial Guidelines
for more information.



Originally published at https://www.einpresswire.com/article/627758143/waking-lion-press-announces-the-release-of-shakespeare-s-first-folio-ultimate
